import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function Inventory() { const [newInventory, setNewInventory] = useState({ name: "", vendor: "", volume: "", price: "", }); const [inventoryList, setInventoryList] = useState([]); const handleAdd = () => { if ( !newInventory.name.trim() || !newInventory.vendor.trim() || !newInventory.volume || !newInventory.price ) return; setInventoryList([...inventoryList, newInventory]); setNewInventory({ name: "", vendor: "", volume: "", price: "", unitPrice: "", }); }; const calcUnitPrice = (price, volume) => { if (!price || !volume) return "-"; const match = volume.match(/\d+/); if (!match) return "-"; const qty = parseInt(match[0], 10); return `$${(price / qty).toFixed(2)}`; }; return (

setNewInventory({ ...newInventory, volume: e.target.value }) } className="border px-3 py-2 rounded w-full focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400 focus:outline-none" />
setNewInventory({ ...newInventory, price: e.target.value === "" ? "" : parseFloat(e.target.value), }) } className="border px-3 py-2 rounded w-full focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400 focus:outline-none" />
